name: Temple Tactics
description:
Are you able to think outside the box and smart enough to beat all the puzzles and riddles of the antique Aztec temple? In “Temple Tactics” your task is to put blocks together to create a structure, which then must be navigated through the temple’s mazes. Only a true adventurer will find the old treasure in every single temple room.
